COM S 319.comment: This class has group projects, so be sure to pick a good teammate.
There are in-class activities which are worth points. They're not hard, but they help reinforce concepts, so do the activity and don't just copy/paste.
Do the Zybooks, they're easy points.
You have creative freedom on your projects, take advantage of that and make a website you'll love and care about not just what's easiest.

COM S 321.comment: Go to lectures, they cover things that aren't in the textbook.

POL S 385.comment: Pretty reading heavy, but it all feels worth it.
it is an exam heavy course.

POL S 344.comment: Don't fall behind, it'll be hard to catch up later on.

PHIL 343.comment: This class has a couple of essays, the professor wasn't a harsh grader though.
Make sure to do the readings!

PHYS 231.comment: I do not recommend taking this class online.

PHYS 232.comment: Only take this class if you have good time management, or aren't taking many other credits.

MATH 166.comment: I highly recommend watching Steve Butler's YouTube videos when you study for this course.

MATH 265.comment: Make sure to really pay attention to the practice quizzes. The quiz and exam questions are often the same (with different numbers).
